name: Magic Gems Puzzle 2
description:
Magic Gems Puzzle 2 is a well-designed epic puzzle game!
Travel through magical temple worlds, challenge hundreds of levels in this delicious puzzle adventure!
Magic Treasure features:
● 100 well-designed levels
● Dazzling special effects
● Memorable classic gameplay
● Eight kinds of sorcerer skills
● Experience the most magical lands
● Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master
